column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Strange Man says : " Aunt Wu is expecting you . "
#Text=Katara says : " Really ? "
#Text=Meng says : " My name is Meng and I 'm Aunt Wu 's assistant . "
#Text=Meng says : " Well , hello there . "
#Text=Aang says : " Hello . "
#Text=Meng says : " Can I get you some tea or some of Aunt Wu 's special bean curd puffs ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " I 'll try a curd puff . "
#Text=Meng says : " Just a second .
#Text=" Meng says : " That rhymes with Meng !
#Text=And you 've got some pretty big ears , do n't you ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I guess .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Do n't be modest !
#Text=They 're huge !
#Text=" Meng says : " Well , Aang , it was very nice to meet you .
#Text=Very nice .
#Text=" Aang says : " Likewise .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I ca n't believe we 're here in the house of nonsense .
#Text=" Katara says : " Try to keep an open mind , Sokka .
#Text=There are things in this world that just ca n't be explained .
#Text=Would n't it be nice to have some insight into your future ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It would be nice to have some bean curd puffs .
#Text="
